replies.msg:
AXA保險狗
但因為佢CS 係只可以online enquiry 仲要有word limit on99所以大家可能要分開兩次submit enquiry
同埋要入電話email depends on各位願唔願意提供啦 因為我真係AXA個客 所以我覺留就冇所謂

嗱!我用咗5分鐘寫 grammar should be fine 但歡迎大家改下內容

Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to complain the misconduct of one of your Financial Consultants, Wang, Xizhao, Javier. On 23 July 2019 around 6pm, he tore down the leaflets on Democracy Wall at City University of Hong Kong, and he destroyed the Statue of Democracy. The whole process was filmed and posted on @cityusu.cbc Instagram and he was later arrested by the police.

According to his LinkedIn profile, he is now working for AXA as Financial Consultant. As the No.1 Global Insurance Company, AXA is always trying to promote "Live without Worries", however, the vandalism already proved that he was not capable of providing professional service to the customers without worries. We, as one of the AXA's customers, have lost confidence in the company as your staff is committing a criminal offence. Not to mention people purchase insurance is to provide extra protection for ourselves, but what he did was trying to destroy HK's core values and your company's image, we do not feel protected at all. His behaviour seriously harmed the professional image of AXA. Strong moral principles are no longer applicable to your company, please immediately terminate his contract with your company, or else, AXA's business reputation will be continuously harmed by Mr.Wang.

We will also file a complaint with The Hong Kong Confederation of Insurance Brokers regarding this issue. Please look into the case immediately and a follow-up action is expected within 2 weeks. We are more than happy to provide more information if needed.

Thank you for your kind attention.

Yours truly,
xxxxxxxxxxxxx

嗱!我用咗5分鐘寫 grammar should be fine 但歡迎大家改下內容

Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to complain the misconduct of one of your Financial Consultants, Wang, Xizhao, Javier. On 23 July 2019 around 6pm, he tore down the leaflets on Democracy Wall at City University of Hong Kong, and he destroyed the Statue of Democracy. The whole process was filmed and posted on @cityusu.cbc Instagram and he was later arrested by the police.

According to his LinkedIn profile, he is now working for AXA as Financial Consultant. As the No.1 Global Insurance Company, AXA is always trying to promote "Live without Worries", however, the vandalism already proved that he was not capable of providing professional service to the customers without worries. We, as one of the AXA's customers, have lost confidence in the company as your staff is committing a criminal offence. Not to mention people purchase insurance is to provide extra protection for ourselves, but what he did was trying to destroy HK's core values and your company's image, we do not feel protected at all. His behaviour seriously harmed the professional image of AXA. Strong moral principles are no longer applicable to your company, please immediately terminate his contract with your company, or else, AXA's business reputation will be continuously harmed by Mr.Wang.

We will also file a complaint with The Hong Kong Confederation of Insurance Brokers regarding this issue. Please look into the case immediately and a follow-up action is expected within 2 weeks. We are more than happy to provide more information if needed.

Thank you for your kind attention.

Yours truly,
xxxxxxxxxxxxx
